item.title: How to really using Hugo and GitHub action together
item.description: This is my first time to create a blog. Yes, I know I know, I’m an software engineer, I had learn to create and deploy a website in my early days at my university. But back then (2007), there isn’t much framework and way to do that like now (2021). And I have forgot alot of things, in order to learn new things. So it’s like start at the beginning.
